sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'
import DisplayList from './DisplayList'
import { Navbar, Nav, NavDropdown, Form, FormControl, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'
import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'

//filtering, sorting, addTo/removeFrom aggregator

export default class FilteredList extends Component {


    //onSelectFilterSize = sets the state 
    //matchesFilterSize = create filtering condition 


  

    
    
    constructor() {
        super()
        this.state = {
            exotic: "All",
            type: "All"
        }
    }


    
    
    render () {
        return (

            <Navbar collapseOnSelect expand="lg" bg="dark" variant="dark">
            <Navbar.Brand href="#home">Pet-Shop</Navbar.Brand>
            <Navbar.Toggle aria-controls="responsive-navbar-nav" />
            <Navbar.Collapse id="responsive-navbar-nav">
              <Nav className="mr-auto">

                  
                <NavDropdown title="Pet Type" id="collasible-nav-dropdown">

                  <NavDropdown.Item href="#action/3.1">
                      <Nav.Link eventKey="Mammal" onSelect={this.onSelectFilterType}></Nav.Link>Mammal
                      </NavDropdown.Item>

                  <NavDropdown.Item href="#action/3.2">
                      <Nav.Link eventKey="Bird" onSelect={this.onSelectFilterType}></Nav.Link>Bird
                      </NavDropdown.Item>

                  <NavDropdown.Item href="#action/3.3">
                      <Nav.Link eventKey="Fish" onSelect={this.onSelectFilterType}></Nav.Link>Fish
                      </NavDropdown.Item>

                  <NavDropdown.Divider />

                  <NavDropdown.Item href="#action/3.4">
                      <Nav.Link eventKey="All" onSelect={this.onSelectFilterType}></Nav.Link>All
                      </NavDropdown.Item>

                </NavDropdown>

                <NavDropdown title="Exotic Level" id="collasible-nav-dropdown">

                  <NavDropdown.Item href="#action/3.1">
                    <Nav.Link eventKey="Low" onSelect={this.onSelectFilterExotic}></Nav.Link>Low
                    </NavDropdown.Item>

                  <NavDropdown.Item href="#action/3.2">
                    <Nav.Link eventKey="Medium" onSelect={this.onSelectFilterExotic}></Nav.Link>Medium
                    </NavDropdown.Item>

                  <NavDropdown.Item href="#action/3.3">
                    <Nav.Link eventKey="High" onSelect={this.onSelectFilterExotic}></Nav.Link>High
                    </NavDropdown.Item>

                  <NavDropdown.Divider />

                  <NavDropdown.Item href="#action/3.4">
                    <Nav.Link eventKey="All" onSelect={this.onSelectFilterExotic}></Nav.Link>All
                    </NavDropdown.Item>

                </NavDropdown>

                <NavDropdown title="Price" id="collasible-nav-dropdown">
                  <NavDropdown.Item href="#action/3.1">Low to High</NavDropdown.Item>
                  <NavDropdown.Item href="#action/3.2">High to Low</NavDropdown.Item>
                  <NavDropdown.Divider />
                  <NavDropdown.Item href="#action/3.4">Our Picks</NavDropdown.Item>
                </NavDropdown>


              </Nav>
            </Navbar.Collapse>
          </Navbar>
          
        
           
        )
    }
    
    
}
    

//this.props.list to refer to FilteredList list = {productList}
